authors.bio: Friendly tech educator, family man, diversity champion, probably argue a bit too much. Formerly a backend engineer. Talk to me about JavaScript (frontend or backend), the amazing Vue.js, DevOps, DevSecOps, anything JamStack. Writer on DEV.to

authors.title: Vonage Developer Educator

authors.bio: Greg is a Developer Educator @Vonage. Coming from a PHP background, but not restricted to one language. An avid gamer and a Raspberry pi enthusiast. Often found bouldering at indoor climbing venues.

Lorna Mitchell
authors.bio: Lorna is a software engineer with an incurable blogging habit. She works on the Developer Relations team at Nexmo and tries to tame words and code in equal measure.
